textos_fuente.text: 95: Cory, owner of HERBA reLEAF & Kava Korner  by Kava and Kettlebells Kava and Kettlebells By Heidi Rene CPT Heidi & her husband Charles (certified meathead), dive into the world of botanicals including kava & kratom, while also exploring other facets to a healthy lifestyle! Listen on Spotify Available on Report content on Spotify 95: Cory, owner of HERBA reLEAF & Kava Korner Kava and Kettlebells Sep 29, 2024 Share 00:00 50:29 134: The Veteran Led Movement To Replace Alcohol With Plants Two military veterans. One mission: Replace booze with botanicals.In this episode, we sit down with Dr. Bob and Mikey ‚Äî two former service members leading a powerful movement to rethink how veterans (and civilians) unwind, heal, and connect. From combat zones to conscious consumption, their journey into terpene-infused beverages and plant-based alternatives is changing the game.üéôÔ∏è What you‚Äôll learn:‚Ä¢ What *terpenes* actually are ‚Äî and why they matter ‚Ä¢ Why alcohol might be holding back your healing ‚Ä¢ How plants are helping vets reconnect, recover, and thrive ‚Ä¢ The science behind mood, memory, and aroma ‚Ä¢ How to be intentional with functional plant-based drinks  Whether you're sober curious, plant-curious, or just ready to ditch the hangover... this convo will open your mind. Sep 08, 2025 01:13:36 133: The Crash that Almost took our Family Seven years ago, our family‚Äôs life changed forever. While driving with our two young kids, our car went under a semi and was completely crushed. No one should have survived‚Ä¶ but somehow, we did.In this video, we share the full story of the accident, the recovery that followed, and how it transformed everything about the way we live today. From Heidi‚Äôs traumatic brain injury and weeks in neurological rehab, to the role fitness played in her recovery, this experience is one of the reasons we don‚Äôt drink alcohol, why we turned to kava instead, and why we continue to make health and family our top priorities.If this story resonates with you, we‚Äôd love to hear from you in the comments. Thank you for supporting us as we share not just our journey, but the lessons we‚Äôve learned along the way! üôè Aug 26, 2025 48:03 132: Chris Kratom, the Man Who Brought Kratom to the US Heidi & Charles sit down with Chris Kratom, the owner of NuWave Botanicals and the Elixir Lounge Kava Bar in Houston, TX. Chris was one of the first vendors to really bring kratom to the US in a large capacity and did so with absolute quality and transparency in mind. Chris has been in the industry for a very long time and has a WEALTH of knowledge on the kratom industry as a whole. Don't miss the one, some very good info packed in here... Aug 19, 2025 01:13:35 131: Thom Fun's Kratom & Kava Kombucha is in the House!! What happens when you mix nightlife culture, bold flavors, and a whole new way to unwind? Meet some of the founders of Thom Fun‚Äôs Original ‚Äî the creators behind what might just be the sexiest drink you‚Äôve never tried. In this episode, we dive into how they started, what makes their beverages unique, and why more and more people are reaching for them instead of alcohol.Whether you‚Äôre into innovative drinks, fascinating founder stories, or just curious about what‚Äôs next in nightlife, you‚Äôll want to listen until the end.üëâ Check them out: https://www.thomfunsoriginal.com/üì∏ Follow on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thomfunsoriginal/ Aug 12, 2025 01:01:54 130: HHS, RFK JR. on the scheduling of 7-OH Heidi & Charles give their thoughts on the recent hearing about the recommended scheduling of 7-OH, the synthetic compound derived from kratom. We give our thoughts on scheduling vs. regulating, the implications of both, and overall the impact this has on the botanical space. Aug 04, 2025 33:49 129: How to Break the Emotional Eating Loop Are you stuck in a cycle of emotional eating‚Äîand you don‚Äôt even know why?In this episode, we break down why emotional and mindless eating happens, how to identify your personal triggers, and simple, powerful tools to start breaking free from the loop‚Äîwithout guilt or shame.üëâ Whether you‚Äôre stress-eating at night, bingeing after a bad day, or reaching for food when you‚Äôre not even hungry, this video is for you.WHAT YOU‚ÄôLL LEARN:‚úÖ Why emotional eating isn‚Äôt about willpower‚úÖ How to identify what you‚Äôre really feeling before you eat‚úÖ Tools to break the cycle (without giving up your favorite foods)‚úÖ How alcohol and poor sleep sneak into the loop too‚úÖ The one mindset shift that changes everythingüéß Listen. Reflect. Take back control.You deserve a relationship with food that‚Äôs rooted in self-awareness‚Äînot shame.üôå Follow us on IG: @Kava_KettlebellsWe post more mindset tips, workouts, and raw, real conversations about food, fitness, and mental health. Jul 23, 2025 39:41 128: When should you drink kava?! Heidi & Charles dive into when is the best time to drink kava. Before you think, "all the time", hear us out! Kava is a tool, and depending on what you want from it, can be the perfect thing for the perfect time! Jul 17, 2025 22:50 127: 10 Unwritten Gym Rules You Need to Know Heidi & Charles break down some of the things in the gym NOT to do so you don't become "that" person. Gym etiquette is a must, and being respectful to others in the gym makes it a more inviting and welcoming space. So listen up, and join us on this one! Jul 09, 2025 41:15 126: Eddie Anaya, Owner of Island Kava Co. Heidi & Charles bring Eddie Anaya onto the show, owner of Island Kava Co. This episode hits different! We go into some hard truths about why high performers should be the ones drinking kava, the alcohol culture in America, and being an entrepreneur while serving in the military. Give this one a listen asap! Jun 23, 2025 01:17:25 125: On Scene at Kava House Brand, Hwy 19 Location in St Pete, FL Heidi & Charles record an episode on site at Kava House Brand kava bar in St Pete at their Hwy 19 location. This episode features 3 separate interviews with staff and brand contributors. In those interviews, we cover what the brand stands for, the kava bar scene itself, and the community aspect that kava & kratom is bringing to the local community. Jun 16, 2025 44:04 124: Why Marriage is Easy! The Lifestyle Episode We Keep Getting Asked to Do Heidi & Charles talk about a lifestyle topic we frequently get asked; how do we maintain a vibrant and healthy marriage? Despite what society says, we think its pretty damn easy. Listen as we break down something personal to us outside of the usual kava & fitness! May 28, 2025 56:36 123: Kratom; An overview, its forms, and 7OH Heidi & Charles dropped a new kratom intro episode for YouTube, but we got you on audio! We talk a little more on its forms, and also touch upon 7OH and how its misguiding potential users! May 19, 2025 31:28 122: Live Like Someone's Watching w/Manny Lamson What does it take to lead with discipline, train like your life depends on it, and live every day like someone‚Äôs watching?In this powerful episode, we sit down with Manny Lamson, a U.S. Air Force officer and 1st Form fitness coach, to talk about what it really means to live with purpose, and build habits with programs such as 75 hard.We get into leadership, physical training, mental toughness, and why ignoring the opinions of others is a superpower.Whether you‚Äôre chasing excellence in the gym, in your career, or in how you show up for others‚Äîthis one will hit home. May 12, 2025 55:42 121: The Only Supplements you Need Heidi & Charles break down their staple supplements in this episode. We go over the vitamins, minerals, and extra supplements we have year round and why we choose to use them. Hopefully this helps cut through some of the BS out there in the supplement space! Apr 28, 2025 46:56 120: F*CK Being Average; What it Takes to Succeed in Your Fitness Journey Heidi & Charles discuss the idea of leaving the "average" lifestyle and leveling up in all areas of life, such as fitness & health, and why you need to leave the naysayers behind you. This might ruffle some feathers, but you know what we are about - real talk! Apr 21, 2025 35:39 119: Why you SHOULDN'T go to a kava bar! Heidi & Charles give some reasons why a kava bar isn't always the answer, and how you can make kava at home yourself for cheaper and with better quality control and personalization. Additionally, we talk about how some kava bars may not just fit your vibe and thats okay! Apr 14, 2025 35:51 118: Rajiv, owner of Kava Vinaka Heidi & Charles sit down with Rajiv, the founder of Kava Vinaka, to explore his incredible journey from Fiji to founding one of the most trusted kava companies in the U.S.Rajiv shares what it was like growing up in Fiji, moving to America at 13, and how his love for kava evolved into a full-blown passion and business. We dive into the roots of traditional kava culture, how it‚Äôs shared communally in Fiji, and how that experience compares to the vibe of modern American kava bars. Apr 07, 2025 47:13 117: Cali Sober vs. Florida Sober: New Trends in the Non Alcohol Space Heidi & Charles explore the popular Cali Sober trend, but also take a look at the upcoming "Florida Sober" term as well, and what both mean. We talk perspective on sobriety, cannabis, and how kava & kratom fit into the discussion as well! Mar 25, 2025 47:39 116: Douglas La Rose, Kava Coalition Executive Director and Industry OG Heidi & Charles welcome Douglas La Rose onto the podcast, whom you might have known as the Kavasseur, a long time reviewer and kava industry OG who has now stepped into the role of executive director at the Kava Coalition. We talk kava transparency in the industry, the growth of American kava culture, and the future of where this plant is headed! Mar 17, 2025 01:00:57 115: Why you NEED TO SLEEP! Heidi & Charles talk about one of our favorite topics.. SLEEP! Building healthy sleeping habits & focusing on enhancing sleep is the ultimate cheat code in life, and we go over some tips and concepts that can help you fix & improve your snooze time. Mar 14, 2025 33:28 114: Rest & Recovery Tips and Tricks for the Gym Heidi & Charles talk about their personal views on what they do to rest and recovery while reaching their fitness goals. We talk training, nutrition, sleep, supplementation, and of course how kava plays a role into bouncing back bigger, faster, and stronger! Mar 05, 2025 35:34 113: Ninja Warrior Karsten Williams Heidi & Charles welcome Karsten Williams, 7x American Ninja Warrior National Finalist onto the show to talk all things about ninja training, building a community around this style of fitness, building Ninja Project, and of course about some kava & kratom! Feb 27, 2025 53:41 112: Kava for the Veteran community & First Responders Heidi & Charles discuss why the Veteran community needs to discover kava and its benefits. Additionally, we speak to how military members who are currently serving could benefit from kava, and additionally first responders. High stress, traumatic jobs like these impact in ways that are different than normal life, and kava can support dealing with issues that arise in these communities. Feb 17, 2025 38:44 111: The Reality of Mommy Wine Culture Heidi & Charles bring Tessa, owner of Lumenade kratom beverages, and Ashley, owner of Alchemist Kava Bar on the show to talk about the phenomena of the "mommy wine culture". This is the concept thats pushed in movies, pop culture, and social media that encourages moms to reach for the bottle of wine to "fit in" with the mom club. Feb 11, 2025 49:49 110: Lisa Lozada on Survival Swimming, Sober Parenting, and more! Heidi & Charles bring Lisa Lozada on the show, owner of The Swim Gym Southwest FL. We talk about her journey as a business owner, CPT, homeschooling, and being an advocate for a alcohol free lifestyle. Feb 06, 2025 50:56 109: Kava & Intimacy with your Partner Heidi & Charles bring back some more talk on kava and how it can help enhance those intimate moments with your partner. While we have touched on this before, we wanted to bring it to life for YouTube, so listen again and see what nuggets we touch on this time! Jan 26, 2025 29:13 108: Revisiting Kava Side Effects Heidi & Charles take a look at the most common side effects of consuming kava, whether in the form of capsules, extracts, or the traditional drink. We talk about our anecdotal experiences, what research says, and how to mitigate the mild sides that kava may bring. Jan 19, 2025 36:54 107: What is Kava? Heidi & Charles give the YouTube audience an overview of what kava is, and we have the audio here for you! While we have done "what is kava" episodes way back when, this is a good revisit of what this wonderful plant does! Jan 12, 2025 42:56 106: Our First YouTube Episode! K&K Re-Introduction Heidi & Charles dropped their FIRST YouTube episode today! This is the audio only version of that episode, where we do a re-introduction to ourselves, Kava & Kettlebells, and what to expect moving forward! Jan 05, 2025 31:03 105: Censorship in the botanical & health space Heidi & Charles give an emotionally charged take on censorship in the botanical space, namely for kratom but also potentially kava. We also give thoughts on how a lot of health & wellness items are also pushed away and why this is a bad thing. Also, we give updates on our YouTube launch! Dec 25, 2024 38:22 104: Wray Payne, owner of Tortuga Beverage Co Heidi & Charles welcome Wray Payne on the show, who is the owner of Tortuga Beverage Co. Tortuga makes kratom, kava, D9, and blue lotus canned beverages with all natural ingredients and nano extract technology. Wray comes from a brewing background, along with hemp industry experience, that all came together when he decided to embark on a botanical beverage company! Dec 15, 2024 45:54 103: Why YOU need to be taking creatine! Heidi & Charles talk all about creatine on this episode, including the physical and mental benefits of supplementation. We also talk a bit about our East Coast FL kava trip and an exciting kava bar experience "first" for Charles! Dec 08, 2024 43:16 102: Josh Sutherland, owner of Pure Infinity Botanicals, blows the lid on the kratom industry Heidi & Charles welcome Josh Sutherland on the show, owner of Pure Infinity Botanicals, one of the largest kratom & kava companies in the United States. Josh gives us his story on how we built the business from $500 to what it is today, and also blows the lid on the kratom industry and how synthetic extracts are pushing out the natural form on the plant. Nov 24, 2024 01:13:52 101: Brandon, Steve & Bennie from Tea Time kratom seltzers! Heidi & Charles welcome Tea Time, a family owned kratom beverage company onto the show today! We have Steve & Brandon, the father and son duo who started the business, along with their Texas sales rep Bennie talk all things Tea Time. Hear about the story behind the company, what they are doing, and where they are going! Nov 20, 2024 45:57 100: Our 100th Episode!!! Reminiscing & Future Talk Heidi & Charles celebrate their 100th episode of Kava & Kettlebells podcast!! We talk about why we started the show, why we keep going, and some future plans. Nov 17, 2024 30:59 99: Miriam, owner of Lava Kava in Portland, Maine! Heidi & Charles welcome Miriam onto the show, who owns Maine's first kava bar, Lava Kava! Miriam is a FL native who moved to Maine on a nursing assignment and after seeing the absence of kava bars, decided to open her own! Nov 10, 2024 49:54 98: Calories in, calories out... Is it that simple? Heidi & Charles talk about the concept of calories in vs. calories out, and where it's not always that simple. We talk metabolism, types of food, how to track your calories, and things to look out for! Oct 27, 2024 42:35 97: John & Sarok, owners of Mad Hatter Kava Bars in Phx, AZ! Heidi & Charles welcome John & Sarok on the show, owners of Mad Hatter kava bars located in the Phoenix metro area! Arizona holds a special place in our heart and we love having kava bar owners from our hometown in Phoenix on the show to share their journey. Oct 20, 2024 53:48 96: Hurricane Milton & How Kava came to the Rescue Heidi & Charles give some updates on their Hurricane Milton experience, and why they choose to drink kava during stressful experiences vs. other botanicals! Oct 12, 2024 32:19 95: Cory, owner of HERBA reLEAF & Kava Korner Heidi & Charles welcome Cory on the show, who not only owns PA's first kava bar, Kava Korner, but HERBA reLEAF kratom, a company that specializes in kratom extracts with extremely high levels of standards when it comes to quality, testing, and consumer safety. We talk in depth on kratom safety, the products that are destroying the kratom market & image, and what consumers need to look out for. Sep 29, 2024 50:29 94: Banging w/Botanicals: Revisiting Sex with Kava, Kratom, and others Heidi & Charles revisit the topic of how botanicals can impact your sex life, both in a positive way and a negative. We look at kava, kratom, cannabis, and kanna and how we enjoy these for our sex life, but some things to also be mindful of! Sep 22, 2024 40:38 93: Stevie, Pioneering Kava in Kentucky! Heidi & Charles bring on Stevie, owner of Cave Valley Kava in Louisville, Kentucky. Cave Valley is the first kava bar in Kentucky and Stevie give us insight into his music heavy kava bar in Louisville, which originally started as a mobile kava service turned brick and mortar bar. Sep 08, 2024 42:15 92: Traveling with Kava & Kratom Heidi & Charles gives some tips on traveling with kava and kratom. Whether driving or flying, domestic or international, we give you our personal advice on how to go about it! Sep 01, 2024 26:51 91: DoD (Military) Bans Kava.. Our Analysis Heidi & Charles analyze the DoD's recent decision to ban kava. We give some facts, speculation, and personal opinions. Aug 24, 2024 44:34 90: Update on the fight for kava in NYC w/Tobly McSmith Heidi & Charles bring Tobly McSmith, owner of Here and Now kava bar in NYC, back on the show for an update on the fight for kava in NYC. Please, share this episode and get the word out there for the future of kava bars not only in NY, but the rest of the country. Aug 24, 2024 40:06 89: Meal Frequency & Nutrient Timing, and Why Nickelback is GOATED Heidi & Charles give their opinions on meal frequency and nutrient timing, and if it makes a difference for body composition. Also, we share our recent enlightenment on Nickelback. Aug 05, 2024 38:19 88: Shane Fichter, Owner of DaKava House in Billings, Montana Heidi & Charles welcome Shane Fichter on the show, owner of DaKava House in Billings, Montana. Shane is a former addict who wound up in prison for a year, then turned his life around and became an MMA fighter, to a kava bar owner, and motivational speaker and coach. This is one for the books! Jul 27, 2024 54:45 87: Growing Kratom with Devin & Brandon Heidi & Charles talk to Devin & Brandon, two friends who decided to take their hand at growing kratom in Fort Myers, FL! We talk about growing the plant and also a new Mitragyna species making its way into popularity, Mitragyna Javanica. Jul 21, 2024 51:56 86: Kava vs. Cannabis Heidi & Charles give some of their thoughts on kava vs. cannabis, including similarities and some differences. Also, we catch up a bit after our move down to FL! Jul 06, 2024 36:19 85: Combining Kava & Kratom Heidi & Charles hit on a controversial topic, combining kava & kratom together. We talk about our opinions on mixing them both, and some things to look out for if you decide to choose the path of consuming both at the same time! Jun 16, 2024 29:30 Show more episodes ¬© 2025 Spotify AB Careers Legal Help App Store Google Play
